flavorText:
"Let Volrath choke on his crop of hatred."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

foreignData.name: Ernte des Lebens
foreignData.text: Bringe eine beliebige Anzahl an Karten Deiner Wahl aus Deinem Friedhof zurück auf Deine Hand. Du kannst nicht mehr Karten wählen, als die Anzahl an schwarzen bleibenden Karten, die ein Gegner Deiner Wahl kontrolliert, beträgt.

name: Reap
originalText: Return any number of target cards from your graveyard to your hand. You cannot choose more cards than the number of black permanents target opponent controls.

rulings.text: This card has received errata so that it now targets a specific opponent.
The count of the number of black permanents the targeted opponent controls is done during announcement since it only affects target selection. It does not get recounted later.

text: Return up to X target cards from your graveyard to your hand, where X is the number of black permanents target opponent controls as you cast this spell.
